import numpy as np
def heuristics_v2(el: tuple[int, ...], n: int, w: int) -> float:
    # Number of elements penalty
    num_penalty = len(el) / n
    
    # Elements sum penalty
    sum_penalty = sum(el) / w
    
    # Distance penalty
    dist_penalty = sum(abs(el[i] - xi) for i, xi in enumerate(el)) / (n * w)
    
    # Centroid distance penalty
    centroid = sum(el) / len(el)
    dist_centroid = sum(abs(x - centroid) for x in el) / (n * w)
    
    penalty = num_penalty + sum_penalty + dist_penalty + dist_centroid
    
    return -penalty
